contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.qandaqu.QAndAQuestionPageContent:
When attempting to upgrade the Xperience by Kentico nuget packages of a local site running on .Net 9.0 from version 30.0.0 to 30.1.0, I am receiving the following error:
``` Detected package downgrade: Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory from 9.0.0 to 8.0.1. ```
Has anyone else experienced this?
***
**Environment**
* Xperience by Kentico version: \[30.0.0] * .NET version: 9.0 * Execution environment: Private cloud (Virtual machine) * <https://docs.kentico.com/developers-and-admins/installation/update-xperience-by-kentico-projects>
